name: Witch girl got killed. (itch)
description:
Witch girl got killed. is a first person fantasy horror action game inspired by Japanese anime!

You are a witch girl in training.

∙Your mission is to infiltrate a labyrinth that has appeared in town and destroy its brain.
∙The town and the labyrinth are crawling with troublesome monsters. If you stumble upon one, run away as fast as you can.
∙The monsters respond to footsteps and light, but are particularly sensitive to magic. Exercise caution when using your powers.

Your magic abilities haven’t yet matured. Still, you can use basic magic.

Traces of sigils drawn by a predecessor are scattered throughout the town and the labyrinth.
Use magic atop one of these sigils and you’ll be able to warp to a new location.
Moreover, while using magic, you’ll be able to see things that aren’t of this world.
Do your best to make effective use of your magic, escape from monsters, and conquer the labyrinth.


∙The game’s total play time is between 40 and 60 minutes.

Controls:
Movement : WASD
Jump : Space
Options : Tab
Dash mode ON/OFF : LSHIFT
Action (Get/Use Item) : Left Click
Select Item : Mouse wheel
Sights in the center of the screen ON/OFF : R
Flashlight ON/OFF : Right click
Use/stop magic : E
